Search engine tailored for AI agents.
\nFollow these steps to obtain your Tavi:
Follow these steps to obtain your Tavily API Key:

1. Visit [tavily](https://tavily.com/) and create an account.
2. Log in and navigate to your dashboard.
3. Locate and copy your API key from the dashboard.
Search for data based on a query.
Retrieve raw web content from specified: Retrieve raw web content from specified URLs.
The search query you want to execute wit: The search query you want to execute with Tavily.
The depth of the search. It can be \"bas: The depth of the search. It can be "basic" or "advanced".
The category of the search. This will de: The category of the search. This will determine which of our agents will be used for the search.
The number of days back from the current: The number of days back from the current date to include in the search results. Only available when using the "news" search topic. Default is 3.
The time range back from the current dat: The time range back from the current date to include in the search results.
The maximum number of search results to: The maximum number of search results to return.
Include a list of query-related images i: Include a list of query-related images in the response.
When include_images is set to True, this: When include_images is set to True, this option adds descriptive text for each image.
Include a short answer to original query: Include a short answer to original query, generated by an LLM based on Tavily's search results.
Include the cleaned and parsed HTML cont: Include the cleaned and parsed HTML content of each search result.
A list of domains to specifically includ: A list of domains to specifically include in the search results.
A list of domains to specifically exclud: A list of domains to specifically exclude from the search results.
The URLs you want to extract with Tavily: The URLs you want to extract with Tavily.
Include a list of images extracted from: Include a list of images extracted from the URLs in the response.
